name: The Spike
summary: The Spike is a 2D volleyball game which is light, but dynamic. Dominate your opponents with speedy and powerful spikes, to take control of the court!
info:
• 别名: 扣杀排球
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: SPG
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2020-06-05
  • 开发: Osik, Funya
  • 发行: PsychoFlux Entertainment
